title: I lost my skins and champion
body:
Hello. From like 2 weeks ago, i bought 2 skins, i had oppened with some good offers. The skins were Malphite - Mecha and Veigar - Bad Santa.
I took some games with both skins, and now am i here, without my skins, 2 weeks later. I just dont have the skins, and i have lost my champion Fizz too, i bought from like 2-3 months ago. (I bought all the things with RP)

Does anyone have or have tried the same thing? What should i do?

replies.body: Taking a look at this, it seems that these items were refunded with your refund tokens.  If this was not intended, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can take a look.  We should be able to provide context!
